roleset.name: carry on flirtations, affairs insincerely, esp with male subject

example.name: Guess who
example.text: The first lady wanted to exact symbolic revenge on her philandering husband.

example.name: the arg
example.text: It 's possible that the media focus on Cain 's philanderings might cause some collateral damage to Newt 's image with the GOP base , but I would n't count on it .
